verses.content: Chun, mihai hrieta a thu po po a hril zoin, Kapernaumah a lût a.
Chun, sipai za hotu tû amanih a suok dittak a dam nawh a, a thi vâng vâng a.
Chuongchun, Isu chanchin a hriet phingleh a suok chu hung sukdam dinga ngên hrâm dingin a kuomah Juda upahai a tir a.
Chun, anni chu Isu kuom an va tlung a, ṭhahnemngaitakin an ngên a, “Ama hi, i thawpêk tlâk a nih:
ei hnam dâm a hmangai a, kan inkhâwmna in dâm a mi bâwlpêk a nih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Isu chun anni a zui tah a. Chun, in an tlung vâng vângin sipai za hotu chun a kuomah a ruolhai a tir a, “Intak sakin hung naw rawh, ka in sûng i lûtna tlâk a ni nawh;
chuleiin, i kuoma hung tlâk khawm niin kân ring nawh a, thu chau hril la ka naupang dam el a tih.

Kei khawm mi thua um ka na, ka hnuoiah sipaihai an um a; hi mipa kuoma hin, ‘Fe rawh’ ka ti leh a feh a; mi dang kuoma khawm, ‘Hung rawh’ ka ti leh a hung hlak; ka suok kuoma khawm, ‘Hi hi thaw rawh,’ ka ti leh a thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chuong thu chu a hrietin ama chu mak a ti hleh a, a nghah a, mipui a zuituhai kuoma chun, “Ka hril cheu hi, Israelhai lai khawm hieng ang lâwma ringna nasa hi ka hmu nawh,” a ta.
Chun, a mi tirhai chu in tieng an fe nâwk a, suok chu damin an hmu tah a.
Chun, sâwt nawteah khaw pa- khat Nain an tia chun a feh a; a închûktirhai le mipui nasatak a kuomah an fe veh a.
Chun, kul kawtkhâr kâwl a tlungin, ngai ta, mithi an hung zâwn dawk a, a nu naupa nei sun a na, ama hlak hmeithai a ni sih a; an khuohai tamtak chu a kuomah an um a.
Chun, Lalpa chun hmeithai chu a hmu phingleh a lunginsiet bêk bêk a, “Ṭap naw,” a ta.
Chun, a va hnai a, hlâng chu a them a; chuongchun, a zâwntuhai chu an ngîr a. Chun, “Tlangvâl, tho rawh ka ti che hi,” a ta.
Chun, mithi chu a ṭhung dawk a, a hung ṭawng tah a. Chun, Isûn a nu kuomah a pêk tah a.
Chun, mi po poin an ṭih a, Pathien an inpâk a, “Eini lai zâwlnei ropuitak a hung um ta a ni hi,” an ta. “Pathienin a mihai a hung sîr tah a nih,” an ti bawk a.
Chun, chu mipa chungchâng thu chu Judai ram po po le a kâwl vêl ram tinah ân thang suok tah a.
Chun, Johan inchûktirhai chun chuong thu po po chu Johan an hril a.
Chuongchun, Johan chun a închûktirhai pahni a ko a, Lalpa kuoma chun a tir a, “A hung ding chu i ni, mi dang am kan la ngai ding?” tiin.
Chun, mihai chu a kuom an hung tlung chun, “Baptistu Johanin, ‘A hung ding chu i ni, mi dang am kan la ngai ding?’ ti dingin i kuomah a mi hung tir a nih,” an ta.
Chun, chuong lai tak chun Isûn damnaw dâm, hripui invawihai, khawhri imanhai tamtak a sukdam a, mitdel tamtak khawm an mit a sukvar a.

Chun, an kuomah, “Fe nâwk ta unla, thil in hmu le in hriet hi Johan va hril ro; mitdelhai an mit a hung var tah, kebaihai kein an lâwn tah, inphârhai an hung inthieng tah, nasêthai an na a hung var tah, mi- thihai keithoin an um tah, pasiehaiin Chanchin Ṭha hril an dawng tah.
Chun, tûkhawm ka chunga lungninawna hmu naw chu an hamṭha,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Johan mi tirhai chu an fe hnungin Isûn mipuihai kuoma chun Johan thu a hril tah a, “Ieng en dingin am thlalêra khan in hang feh a? Luong thli imût hnîng maw?
Annawleh, ieng en ding takin am in hang feh a? Puon innêm sil maw? Ngai ro, puon innêm sil le mi inhawitirhai chu lal inahai in sawnnaw an um.
Annawleh, ieng en ding takin am in hang feh a? Zâwlnei maw? A ni ngei kha, ka ti cheu hi, zâwlnei nêk khawma ropui lem,
‘En ta, ka tirko i hmaah ka tir a nih, Ama chun i hmaah i lampui siem a tih,’ ti, a chanchin an iziek kha, ama hi a nih.
Nuhmei sûnga insieng laia chun Johan nêka ropui lem an um nawh; nisienlakhawm, Pathien rama mi chîn tak khawm ama nêkin an ropui lem,” a ta.
Chun, mi po poin an hrietin, siedâwltuhai leh, Johan baptisma lo chang tah an na, Pathien an inthiem a.
Pharisaihai le dânhretuhai ruok chu a kuoma baptisma lo chang tah an ni ve nawh a, anni ta dinga Pathienin rem a iruotpêk chu an pawm nawh.
Chuongchun, Isu bawkin, “Tu- lai ruoltharhai hi ieng lêm hrilkhîng ka tih aw?
Naupang dâwr hmuna ṭhunga, ‘Theihle kan mûtpêk cheu a, in lâm si nawh a; kan ṭap rak a, in ṭap si nawh a,’ tia inkhêkkhumhai ang hi an nih.
Baptistu Johan chu a hung a, bei a fâk nawh a, uoin khawm a dâwn nawh a, nangnîn, ‘Khawhri a zâwl a nih,’ in tih a.
Mihriem Naupa a hung a, a fâkin a dâwn a, ‘En ta u, bu he mi, uoin he mi, siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai ruolpa saw!’ in ti sih a.
Nisienlakhawm, Varna chu a nau po poin an inthiem,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisaihai laia mi pakhatin a kuomah bu fa dingin a fiel a. Chun, Pharisai ina chun a lût a, thlaithlêng a awt a.
Chun, ngai ta, chu khuoa nu- hmei suol pakhat um chun, Pharisai inah thlaithlêng awtin a ṭhung ti a hriet phingleh alabastar bûrin hriek rim inhnik a hung chawi a.
A hnungah a kepha bula chun ṭap pumin a ngîr a, a mitthliin a kepha a lo far huh a, a samin a hrûk a, a kepha chu a fâwp a, hriek rim inhnik chun a nâl a.
Chun, a fieltu Pharisai chun a hmu chun, a lungrilin, “Hi mipa hi zâwlnei a ni chun a themtu nuhmei hi tu am a ni, mi ieng ang am a ni hre âwm tak, mi suol a ni sih a,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Simon, i kuomah thu bau khat hril ding ka nei,” a ta, a dawn a. Chun, ama chun, “Hril ta la, Inchûktirtu,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn “Tangka inpûktirtu tuin amanih leibattu pahni a nei a; pakhatin duli za nga a bat a, pakhatin sâwmnga.
Chun, thungna an nei nawh a, a ngaidam ve veh a. Chuongchun, chuhai chun a tû lem chun am ama chu hmangai lem an ta?” a ta.
Simon chun, “A ingaidam tam lem chun niin ka ring,” a ta, a dawn a. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “I ti dik ie,” a ta.

Chun, nuhmei tieng chu a nghah a, Simon kuoma chun, “Hi nuhmei hi i hmu? I inah ka hung lût a, nangin ka ke sâwpna ding tui i mi pêk nawh a, ama ruok hin chu a mitthliin ka kepha a sukhuh a, a samin a hrûk a nih.
Nangin fâwp hrim hrim i mi fâwp nawh; ama ruok hin chu ka hung lût hlima inthawk ka kepha fâwp a ma nawh.
Nangin ka luah hriek i mi nâl nawh; ama ruok hin chu ka kepha hriek rim inhnik a nâl.
Chuleiin, ka ti che hi, a suol tamtak kha ngaidamin a um tah; ama khawmin a hmangai ta bêk bêk a ni hi; amiruokchu, ngaidam tlâwm chun, tlâwmtêin a hmangai hlak,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei kuoma chun, “I suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,” a ta.
Chun, a thlaithlêng awtpuihai chun, “Suolhai khawm ngaidam hi tu am a na?” an in tih a.
Chun, ama chun nuhmei kuoma chun, “I ringna hi sandam I ni pha a nih, thlamuongtakin fe rawh,” a ta.
